name: BusinessAsUsual
description:
Business As Usual

All you want to do is go to bed, but people keep knocking on your door. 

WASD to Move 

F to interact with the door

I remember what I first said to Greg when I sat down with him for my midterm pitch, It was “I don't know what I want this game to be, but I know what I want it to feel like. I want it to feel like how you feel when you listen to a Men At Work song.” We struggled to gamify ‘Down Under’ so we settled for ‘Who Can It Be Now’. A song in which a social recluse is constantly bombarded with having people knock on his door, this was the direct inspiration for ‘BusinessAsUsual’ whose namesake is the album on which ‘Who Can It Be Now’ appears on.
